name: Interactive Multi-Game Demo Disc: Version 15
overview: The sampler includes a simple menu and three playable single-player demos: Custom Robo Mario Kart: Double Dash!! Sonic Heroes (with time reset) In addition to the playables, the disc also features pre-release movie trailers of the following games: Pokémon Colosseum Metal Gear Solid: The Twin Snakes Splinter Cell: Pandora Tomorrow Killer 7 Metroid Zero Mission Final Fantasy: Cyrstal Chronicles Custom Robo NFL Street Need For Speed: Underground The Sims Bustin' Out I-Ninja Mega Man Anniversary Edition James Bond: Everything or Nothing
